name: malonyl-[acyl-carrier protein]:L-glutamine amido-ligase (AMP-forming)
definition: ATP + Malonyl-[acyl-carrier protein] + L-Glutamine + H2O <=> AMP + Diphosphate + Malonamoyl-[acyl-carrier protein] + L-Glutamate
comment: The substrate of OxyD can be either malonyl-CoA (see R09195) or malonyl-ACP.
